meanings.definition: A person who eats or consumes immoderate amounts of food and drink.
meanings.sent1: Some gluttons at the party ate all the cake before anyone else could have a slice.
meanings.sent2: The buffet was empty in minutes, thanks to the hungry gluttons.
meanings.sent3: The gluttons at the table were like vacuum cleaners, sucking up all the food in sight.
meanings.sent4: She was a glutton for sweets, devouring every dessert in sight.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gluttons feasting on the banquet will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: To indulge in something excessively or voraciously.
meanings.sent1: He would gluttons on video games for hours without taking a break.
meanings.sent2: The kids gluttons on candy until they felt sick.
meanings.sent3: She would gluttons on shopping sprees, buying everything in sight.
meanings.sent4: The company gluttons on profits, never satisfied with their earnings.
meanings.sent5: The artist would gluttons on inspiration, creating masterpiece after masterpiece.
